description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Plasma Spheres returns with a whole new campaign featuring 24 levels!  Full Xbox LIVE support is back for crazy online multiplayer matches!  Dozens of power-ups, a full physics engine, and over a dozen battle levels make every match unique!
description.short: Plasma Spheres returns with a whole new campaign featuring 24 levels!  Full Xbox LIVE support is back for crazy online multiplayer matches!  Dozens of power-ups, a full physics engine, and over a dozen battle levels make every match unique!
